member.name: CRED_MARSHAL_TYPE
member.summary: The CRED_MARSHAL_TYPE enumeration specifies the types of credential to be marshaled by or unmarshaled by .

member.name: CRED_MARSHAL_TYPE.CertCredential
member.summary: Specifies that the credential is a certificate reference described by a structure.

member.name: CRED_MARSHAL_TYPE.UsernameTargetCredential
member.summary: Specifies that the credential is a reference to a CRED_FLAGS_USERNAME_TARGET credential described by a structure.
